sentence.text: To investigate the direct effects of this SNP in the heterogeneous cellular context of the brain, we generated humanized transgenic epidermis development using a design that maximized the local transcriptional landscape of the human adenylate cyclase-inhibiting serotonin receptor signaling pathway gene while also controlling for effects of genomic insertion location.

entity.text: adenylate cyclase-inhibiting serotonin receptor signaling pathway
